title: Ranked team que y cant it be open forever
body:
That feel when u get a team together and play rank 5s bashout a shit ton of games as a group now feels like its restricted alot note im thinking the gods 5s are back but y only in certain time periods?

Y cant it just be free all the time and tbh if u say it cause its not as popular then if u go into a dynamic que by yourself when the server peak time of players are which is when 5s start up i can say that u will get a faster que in ranked 5s then the dynamic crap que 

Ranked 5s just feels like to me its need more then ever since the dynamic system is staying which is trash so y not let 5s be on all the time 

And tbh the only reason y id prefered 5s over dynamic is due to the idea of WAY WAY BETTER GAMEPLAY and THE GAMES ARE MORE BALANCED plus U HAVE RELIABLE PLAYERS

Thoughts?
